title: Pref patch, updated README, images, & versionCode for release
message:
Pref patch, updated README, images, & versionCode for release

[Fix]: Last minute patch to the PreferenceUtil & MainActivity to ensure
preference migration goes smoothly from the old scheme to the new one.
[Fix]: Changed from margin to padding to ensure 720dp views rendered
correctly on 5.0.

[Mod]: Updated versionCode/name for next release

[Mod]: Crushed the refresh icon.
[Doc]: Added new screenshots. Updated the README to better describe the
project and show new screenshots.

title: Added new sort by to MainFragment to restore sort order
message:
Added new sort by to MainFragment to restore sort order

[Fix][Mod]: Added new sorting method to MainFragment & check to ensure
the starting currency is never empty. 

This resets the behaviour to be the same of that of the last release of:
USD, CAD, EUR, GBP, JPY. 

This should finish up the refactoring.

title: Added new table to enable a default sort order for output
message:
Added new table to enable a default sort order for output

[Mod][Add]: Added to the Contract, Database Helper, and Content Provider
a second table & column: def_display_order. This column will allows the
pre-specified order defined in the xml to be honour at query time. 

[Mod]: Updated tests to honour the new column & foreign key constraint.
In addition, one enhanced the remaning tests to use a non-application
context (via ProviderTestCase2 & RenamingDelegatingContext). This allows
tests to be done without cross contaminating the database or content
provider.

[Mod]: Changed the ExchangeRateUpdateLoader to ensure that the sort
order is added on first run.
[Mod]: Changed selection projection for the CursorAdapter to exclude the
source currency & specify which _ID to use.

This also lays the groundwork for issue #8 (additional columns may be
used for custom sorts).

title: Added anim. refresh action to MainFrag & fixed warning rotations
message:
Added anim. refresh action to MainFrag & fixed warning rotations

[Add]: Image resources & animation for refresh button.
[Mod]: Added styles for refresh button and removed actionabr shadow for
main activity.

[Mod]: The refresh button now animates when loading in the background
and users can demand an update. Additionally, the warning message (if
visibile) remains visible until the next update check is performed.

[Mod]: Removed default image from layout.

title: [Mod]:Updated YahooApiExchangeRatesUpdate to retry 3x, every second
message:
[Mod]:Updated YahooApiExchangeRatesUpdate to retry 3x, every second

That way a spotty connection doesn't completely botch the attempt.

title: Split Settings from MainActivity, moved the set def. to Activity.
message:
Split Settings from MainActivity, moved the set def. to Activity.

[Add][Ref]: Made Settings activity its own. This is to simplify the
coding and potentially add some new animations later.
Additionally, moved the "resetDefaults" to MainActivity.

[Mod]: Additionally, fixed the progress wheel to only ever spin when the
Loader is running.

title: Removed old holo resources & began work on material design
message:
Removed old holo resources & began work on material design

This commit begins to address issue #7.

[Rem]: Remove lots of image resources, styles, themes, and state
drawables used for the old holo look.
[Rem]: Removed the support-v4 jar as it is given via support-v7

[Mod]: Added colours for the material design look. 
[Ref]: Renamed fragment_currency_value to more accurate
list_item_currency_value
[Mod]: Added drawables for the CursorAdapter list.

[Ref]: Moved application icons to the mipmap directories, as per new
spec. See:
http://android-developers.blogspot.com/2014/10/getting-your-apps-ready-for-nexus-6-and.html

title: Restruct. prefs, fixed MainFragment's date setting, & other edits
message:
Restruct. prefs, fixed MainFragment's date setting, & other edits

[Ref]: Merged settings_info, strings_auth, update_periods into
strings_config.xml
[Mod]: Reworked the PreferenceUtil and Preference structure; no more
boxing, now only default preferences. More importantly, update interval
is now a String which can be readily parsed via the fetch method:
getUpdateInterval(Context).

[Ref][Mod]: ExchangeRateUpdateLoader restructured to appropriately:
- Use the correct JSON preference
- Moved the set/get the update time to PreferenceUtils

[Rea]: Minor simplification of CurrencyCursorAdapter output.
[Mod]: Added method CurrencyCalculator to calculate + format
conversions.

[Rea][Mod]: Update the MainFragment's flow:
- Remove some dead code/comments
- Moved calculation/formatting of conversion to CurrencyCalculator
- Fixed the date formatting
- Fixed the times the progress bar shows/hides

title: Added IntEditTextPreference & updated methods in DateFormatter
message:
Added IntEditTextPreference & updated methods in DateFormatter

[Mod][Rem]: Removed deprecated actions from DateFormatter, added new
function for dates as longs.
[Add]: Added the work around class IntEditTextPreference for easy
setting (may be useful for other projects).

title: [Rem][Doc] Deleted oldmodel & added commit id to oldmodel README
message: [Rem][Doc] Deleted oldmodel & added commit id to oldmodel README

title: Changed functionality flow; majority of app refactor has been done
message:
Changed functionality flow; majority of app refactor has been done

[Mod]: Added Preference for most recent update time & array of default
preferences; i.e. array of arrays.
[Add]: ExchangeRateUpdateLoader is an AsyncTaskLoader for the purposes
of intializing/updating the database.
[Rem][Mod]: CurrencyCalculator - deleted a couple methods, and reworked
how currency formating is done.
[Ref][Add]: Created new adapters based off old ones
- CurrencyDataFilterListAdapter -> CurrencyCursorAdapter; a cursor
adapter to display the output of conversions
- CurrencyDataSpinnerAdapter -> CurrencySpinnerAdapter; a string adapter
to display the currency choices

[Mod]: While still incomplete, the MainFragment loads and updates
appropriately. The update message and currency order still need to be
dealt with.

title: Fixed content provider, added exchange rates update, & updated tests
message:
Fixed content provider, added exchange rates update, & updated tests

[Fix]: CurrencyConverterProvider now works with upper or lowercase
database contents.
[Add]: YahooApiExchangeRatesUpdate performs both request and parsing. 
[Ref][Mod]: Unit test changes -
- Moved PollingCheck and content observer to test package (renaming
observer to UtilityTestContentObserver)
- Added additional for ContentProvider to test uppercase, lowercase,
item and dir queries.
- Added tests for YahooApiExchangeRatesUpdate

All new tests now pass.

title: Renamed ResourceMap & updated some documentation
message:
Renamed ResourceMap & updated some documentation

[Mod][Ref]: renamed CurrencyConvertResourceMap to CurrencyResourceMap
for clarity and added symbol resource
[Doc]: Updated documentation for AbstractSimpleHttpRequest and Yahoo
Parsers.

title: Simplifed abstract parsers;set parsers to ContentValues;added tests
message:
Simplifed abstract parsers;set parsers to ContentValues;added tests

[Mod]: Simiplifed the Abstract XML & JSON parsers for single thread use.
Removing all pause and cancel methods. 
[Mod]: CodeRatePair was modified to be more reliable and return
ContentValues, in both directions.
[Mod]: Both JSON & XML parsers were re-worked to use ContentValues

[Add]: Added tests for:
-CodeRatePair 
-YahooApiCurrencyJsonParser
-YahooApiCurrencyXmlParser
All tests pass.

title: Added test & implementation for ContentProvider
message:
Added test & implementation for ContentProvider

[Add]: ContentProvider provides a simple way to add and remove records
via ContentResolver.
[Mod]: Updated manifest to support the ContentProvider and api 22.

[Add]: PollingCheck was copy/pasted to help test providers. (Source:
Android CTS Tests)
[Add]: Tested ContentResolver and test passes.

title: Added tests & implementations for Contract & DBhelper
message:
Added tests & implementations for Contract & DBhelper

[Add]: Added -
- CurrencyConverterContract: Defines the SQLite contract and provides
utility methods for URI building
- CurrencyConverterDbHelper: DBhelper uses said contract to build new
database and delete old one.

[Add]: Added Curren to map currency codes to resource names and images;
decoupling them from database.

[Add]: Added utility test class for testing similiar methods.
[Add]: Added tests for:
-CurrencyConverterContract
-CurrencyConverterDbHelper

All tests pass.

title: Modified HttpRequests to work with URIs & added test project
message:
Modified HttpRequests to work with URIs & added test project

[Mod]: Modified AbstractSimpleHttpRequest to demain a uri
[Mod]: Made Yahoo request build using URIs.

[Add]: Added test case for YahooRequests; passes.

title: Moved & deprecated entire old model in favour of ContentProviders
message:
Moved & deprecated entire old model in favour of ContentProviders

[Dep][Ref]: Deprecated the old model in favour of a rebuild. Note that
this move is done for an easier historical referencing.

[Mod]: Changed some references to old model.

[Add]: Added a new README.md for the old model to explain the moves
motive.

title: [Doc]: Updated Copyright from 2014 to 2015
message: [Doc]: Updated Copyright from 2014 to 2015

title: [Doc]: Updated screenshots for project's README
message: [Doc]: Updated screenshots for project's README

title: [Mod]: Updated versionCode/name for next release
message:
[Mod]: Updated versionCode/name for next release

Version 3.1:
- Updated settings/preference screen graphics + text colors
- Update date formating
- Tweaked feature handling

Additionally, added android:anyDensity="true" to supported screens.

title: [Fix]: Added safety to MainFragment to activity was not null
message:
[Fix]: Added safety to MainFragment to activity was not null

In the method, updateSourceCurrency() a null check is performed on the
activity to prevent potential null errors. 

[Mod][Rea]: Additionally turned off debugging to remove Log "noise".

title: Merge branch 'feature.preftweak'
message: Merge branch 'feature.preftweak'

title: [Fix]: Integers are set separately to other preferences
message:
[Fix]: Integers are set separately to other preferences

The attempted shift to an xml based preference system hit a snag:
EditPreference, ListPreference, Preference, etc. None of these will
store in a manner than can be retrieved by getInt(String, int). This is
quite bothersome.

So, in meantime, falling back to old methods until extending the
PreferenceClasses.

title: Simplified DateFormatter & removed plurals
message:
Simplified DateFormatter & removed plurals

[Mod][Dep]: Simplified the DateFormatter by moving to DateUtils;
previously it was a nice experiment to see how to create a relative time
display. However, to tidy it up moved to use DateUtils. As such
deprecated old methods.
[Mod]: Removed deprecated methods from mainfragment

[Rem]: Removed the now unused plurals from strings.xml

title: [Mod]: Added explicit support for large screens
message:
[Mod]: Added explicit support for large screens

This is required for pre-API 13

title: [Mod]: Changed method of setting pref defaults
message:
[Mod]: Changed method of setting pref defaults

Taken from the project CareerStack, its an easier way to maintain
preference defaults

title: Adjusted the horizontal padding for xlarge, w700dp, w820dp
message:
Adjusted the horizontal padding for xlarge, w700dp, w820dp

[Add][Mod]: Reduced the horizontal padding for 820dp and added it for
xlarge/700dp

title: Added checkbox drawables & set secondary text colour
message:
Added checkbox drawables & set secondary text colour

[Add]: Added the drawables for the checkbox and set it in theme/styles.
[Fix]: Set the secondary text colour to be grey, primary to be black.

This closes issue #6

title: Moved listview, added padding to listview, fixed colouring issue
message:
Moved listview, added padding to listview, fixed colouring issue

[Ref]: Moved the listview into its own file for easier maintaince
[Fix][Mod]: Added vertical padding to bottom of listview & fixed
flashing listview issue in 2.3.3

title: Applied non-button dismiss fix to Confirm Dialog
message:
Applied non-button dismiss fix to Confirm Dialog

[Fix][Mod]: Confirm Dialog now sends a negative button press whenever
cancelled. Additionally, on click interface now dismisses automatically.

title: [Rea][Ref]: Renamed all variables to be shorter for readablity
message:
[Rea][Ref]: Renamed all variables to be shorter for readablity

Renamed variables that started "com_ovrhere_currConv_..." to just
"currConv_..." or "currconv_...".

title: [Add]: Added copy of tablet layout for main fragment
message:
[Add]: Added copy of tablet layout for main fragment 

This allows older versions to use the tablet layout.

title: [Rem]: Removed unecessary resolutions duplicates for limits
message:
[Rem]: Removed unecessary resolutions duplicates for limits

Both values-large and values-xlarge would be covered by -normal, in this
case

title: [Mod]: Updated versionCode/name for next release
message: [Mod]: Updated versionCode/name for next release

title: Tweaked the colours of the results rows & added higher res icon
message:
Tweaked the colours of the results rows & added higher res icon

[Mod]: Removed colours for odd numbers, added a different blue for evens
[Add]: Larger resolution launcher icon for tablets and the like.

title: Added Json parsing setting & ability to launch "More Apps" intent
message:
Added Json parsing setting & ability to launch "More Apps" intent

[Add]: Added MarketIntent utility which allows for more robust launching
of market intents
[Mod]: Added strings for use in settings fragment
[Mod]: "Use JSON" preference & "More Apps" added to settings frag.

This should close issues #1 and #2

title: Add Json parsing pref & implemented it in async model + minor fix
message:
Add Json parsing pref & implemented it in async model + minor fix

See issue #2

[Mod]: Added JSON preference defaults (true)
[Fix]: Ensured only one request can run at a time in model.
[Mod]: Added Json preference to model allow it to set the request to
JSON and parse it.

title: Moved CodeRatePair,tweaked Xml parser,add JSON parser & fix request
message:
Moved CodeRatePair,tweaked Xml parser,add JSON parser & fix request

See issue #2

[Ref]: Moved CodeRatePair to its own class. Additionally, added the
method to split the id tag (e.g. USDEUR) to the code pair object.
[Add]: Added the json parser to parse the json response and return the
results
[Doc]: Added more explicity documentation to the xml parser about the
expected content

[Fix]: Fixed the json option in the yahoo request. It would have never
triggered in its former state; I had never finished it. Whoops!

Then again, I only just added the json so, no harm?

title: Added gson (2.3) & AbstractJsonParser for parsing json response
message:
Added gson (2.3) & AbstractJsonParser for parsing json response 

See issue #2

[Add]: gson 2.3 jar library + the source, documentation, & properties
files for easy of use in Eclipse
[Add]: AbstractJsonParser provides a slightly easier way to use Json
Reader and a means to pause/resume (if implemented).

title: Improved thread safety in helper, updated model methods to close
message:
Improved thread safety in helper, updated model methods to close

[Doc][Rea]: Improved readablity in the open helper, rearranged tags,
etc.
[Fix]: The returning of helpers is now synch'ed & the list of helpers
made final (we don't intend to let anyone modify it)
[Fix]: Read/write methods now close in the finally{} tag

title: [Fix]: MainActivity backbutton press to give consistent results
message:
[Fix]: MainActivity backbutton press to give consistent results

The hardware button was not giving the same results as actionbar; forgot
to called onSupportNavigateUp() in onBackPressed()

title: [Doc]: Corrected some documentation typos & short-sights
message:
[Doc]: Corrected some documentation typos & short-sights 

Includes the default time in the doc.

title: [Mod][Add]: Updated README to reflect additions & added screenshots
message:
[Mod][Add]: Updated README to reflect additions & added screenshots

These include the screenshots for tablet/small mode & the use of the
PreferenceFragment library.

title: Fixed small screen support on 2.3.3 & changed tablet screen layout
message:
Fixed small screen support on 2.3.3 & changed tablet screen layout

[Add][Mod][Ref]: dp based screen support won't work on pre-3.0 so thus
added limits to:
+ values-small-land
+ values-normal
+ values-large
+ values-xlarge
which all point to/duplicate the values in w320dp (new width from
w300dp)

[Mod][Ref]: Changed the "wide" tablet mode to be for 720dp. This means a
7in tablet will only use it in landscape, not portrait (which looks too
crowded). Additionally, added padding to the list in portrait mode.

title: Set Main to handle multiple fragments
message:
Set Main to handle multiple fragments 

[Mod]: MainActivity now handles the loading of both Settings & Main
fragments. Including the hiding of settings and managament of the action
bar button. This allows settings to be accessible as per issue #1

[Mod]: Updated version number to prepare for next potential release

title: Added better support for diff sizes & mild redesigns - #5
message:
Added better support for diff sizes & mild redesigns - #5

[Add]: Added limits to remove flag image on smaller screens; default
disables, w300dp enables.
[Mod]: MainFragment now ensures to check it's view is visible (required
for backstack). Additionally, it adds and removes its model based on
view not fragment.
[Mod][Ref]: Moved main input views into their own view stub & made the
view hidden resistent. Additionally, removed spacing from list and set
it only on inputs
[Add]: Added layout for large sizes (540dp). Minimal testing thus far.

title: Added settings fragment, various update times, & ToastManager
message:
Added settings fragment, various update times, & ToastManager 

[Add]: Added ConfirmationDialogFragment from CareerStack; rotation
resistent, fragment + activity compatible dialog.
[Add]: ToastManager was added from CareerStack; manages toast.

[Add]: Added SettingsFragment using PreferenceFragment library
(https://github.com/kolavar/android-support-v4-preferencefragment). This
addresses some issues in #1 including:
-Software Version number
-10 different update times (5 min, 15 min, 30, 1 hr, 2hr, 6hr, 12hr,
24hr, 2 days, 1 week)
&
-Reset all settings

title: Moved strings from currency_codes to & added new val for settings
message:
Moved strings from currency_codes to & added new val for settings

[Ref]: Moved currency string names to strings.xml
[Mod]: Added strings for various times for settings
[Add]: Added the list of times parallel to those strings

title: Extended abstract parser & request into YahooApi & updated asyncmodel
message:
Extended abstract parser & request into YahooApi & updated asyncmodel

[Mod]: YahooApiCurrencyRequest now extends AbstractSimpleHttpRequest,
making it safer and tidier.
[Mod]: YahooApiCurrencyXmlParser now extends AbstractXmlParser, making
it cleaner and mmore useful.
[Doc][Mod]: The async model now implements the updated interface from
AbstractSimpleHttpRequest and has better comments to explain how it
works.

title: Added Abstract XmlParser & SimpleHttpRequest from CareerStack
message:
Added Abstract XmlParser & SimpleHttpRequest from CareerStack

[Add]: AbstractXmlParser is a base for simple xml parsing. Can be paused
and resumed (if correctly extended).
[Add]: AbstractSimpleHttpRequest is a base for the entire request mark
the request building. Can be cancelled.

title: Applied fix to asyncmodel, minor changes to pref util & doc changes
message:
Applied fix to asyncmodel, minor changes to pref util & doc changes

[Rea][Fix]: AsyncModel - Removed some clutter comments. Fixed a
potential issue with send(int,Bundle) not casting before moving on
(would give a stack overflow)
[Mod]: Changed the first run preference of Pref Util; this will
technically cause all current settings to reset again but, considering
the lack of user set preferences, this is a non-issue.
[Doc]: Added todo in the formatter
[Doc]: Update comment in the preference info

title: Added thread safety, corrected Handler usage, fixed potential leak
message:
Added thread safety, corrected Handler usage, fixed potential leak

[Fix]: AsyncModel - Added threadsafety to dispose()
[Rea][Fix]: CurrencyExchangeRateAsyncModel - 
- Added thread safety to dispose (only dispose if no update is running)
& fixed potential context leak
- Reworked headless fragment to reattach the listener on recreation
- Removed some junk comments
[Rea][Fix]: MainFragment - 
- Ensured to dispose AsyncModel properly in onDestroy()
- Added Debugging bool and log in handleMessage
- Ensured that the progress bar displayed and hide at the appropriate
times
- Corrected spelling of asycModel to asyncModel

[Mod]: Updated version+build number & set softkeyboard to be
"adjustNothing"

title: [Mod]: Made listener volatile, added safety to setTimeout method
message:
[Mod]: Made listener volatile, added safety to setTimeout method

setTimeout now forbid input < 0. Also updated some comments

title: Added screenshots + graphics, updated README to point to Play Store
message:
Added screenshots + graphics, updated README to point to Play Store

[Add]: Added screenshots + graphics.
[Mod]: README now links to the App in store.
[Doc]: Added proguard to .gitignore

title: Removed deprecated methods, hide keyboards on background click
message:
Removed deprecated methods, hide keyboards on background click

[Add]: Added simple keyboard util for the purposes of hiding the
keyboard.
[Mod]: Added a toucher listener to the rootView to hide the keyboard
when the background is touched.

[Mod][Rem]: Removed the deprecated constructors from
YahooApiCurrencyRequest. Additionally, updates some doc and added a
debug boolean (set false).

title: [Doc]: Updated readme to be actually useful
message:
[Doc]: Updated readme to be actually useful 

Gives brief write up, shows off launcher image.

title: Crushed resources that needed crushing & added alternative res.
message:
Crushed resources that needed crushing & added alternative res.

title: [Add]: Added resources to be holo-compatible
message:
[Add]: Added resources to be holo-compatible

Using http://android-holo-colors.com/
generated and added resources for:
-EditText
-Spinners (sans radioes)

title: Updated doc, tweaked Async model behaviour, Main updates by time
message:
Updated doc, tweaked Async model behaviour, Main updates by time

[Mod]: Changed behaviour of Async model when requesting with true:
-Will force an update and only respond after it gets up.
[Mod]: Added ability to main to:
-Check if it is time to update and, if so, force update (i.e. proper
update behaviour)
-show and hide progress-spinny based upon if looking for update
Additionally tidied some code
[Doc]: Updated adapter documentation.

title: Updated iconography, edited actionbar styles, added new flags imgs
message:
Updated iconography, edited actionbar styles, added new flags imgs

[Add][Mod]: Added & replaced images for flags including a new error flag
to serve as default (in the occurrance of errors).
[Mod]: Added error flag to row views.
[Mod]: Added error flag to main frag & a progress spinner.
[Mod]: Changed actionbar color
[Mod]: Updated styling of actionbar & background (light.darkbar + blue
background)
[Mod]: Added new launcher icons

title: Updated Currency Calc. & adapter to use new currency methods
message:
Updated Currency Calc. & adapter to use new currency methods

[Mod][Dep]: Updated CurrencyCalculator to use the new exchange rates.
Deprecated the old USD methods.
[Mod]: Updated the output adapter to use the new currency rates.

title: YahooApi Request & Parser,Async model; now use multiple rates
message:
YahooApi Request & Parser,Async model; now use multiple rates

[Mod]: YahooApi Request take in a source (currency) list and builds the
smallest possible request possible (via removing redundant requests).
Addition gave it the option to request JSON if desired.
[Mod]: YahooApi parser now parses out the multiple sources of currency
via SimpleExchangeRates. Also added toString method to internal dao's
for debugging.

[Mod]: Updated the default currency rates to be arrays in line with
re-design.
[Mod]: Updated Async model to make use of the new parser + request.

title: Begun redesign of how currency rates are stored & calculated
message:
Begun redesign of how currency rates are stored & calculated

[Add]: Added SimpleExchangeRates to contain exchange rates. This is
mostly a class for fun. It can: 
-Auto generate complement pairs
-Be compact or verbose (i.e. store only half pairs but give both
directions)
[Mod]: Edited the CurrencyData dao to use a hashmap of rates rather than
depending on USD rates. Added functions to set, update and validate the
rates.
[Dep]: getRateFromUSD() now deprecated.
[Mod]: Normalized the database schemea; rates now go into their own
table.
[Mod]: Updated local model to make use of the new CurrencyData methods &
schema redesign.

title: Fixes to local model & database.Add asyncmodel capablity to update
message:
Fixes to local model & database.Add asyncmodel capablity to update

[Mod]: Added manifest permission for Internet.
[Fix][Mod]: Adjusted schema to give give valid ids to the rows 
[Fix]: Fixed model such that undated data was given a date
[Mod]: Async model now uses a headless fragment to make
YahooApiCurrencyRequest & processes the response via the
YahooApiCurrencyRequest.YahooApiCurrencyRequest implemented interface. 

At this point it is just proof of concept, major refactoring to follow.

title: Add YahooApi request creator & xml parser. Add Runnable fragment
message:
Add YahooApi request creator & xml parser. Add Runnable fragment

[Add]: Created starting point for YahooApiCurrencyXmlParser to parse the
xml response and return parsed rates
[Add]: Created starting point for YahooApiCurrencyRequest to perform the
xml request and get currency results based on a single base curreny.
[Add]: RunnableHeadlessFragment can take a runnable and run it at a
later date.

title: Added some synchronzation to main frag & updated the time warning

-All calls made to currencyList are now synchronized
-The timestamp now updates makes use of DateFormatter & only shows if
the preference time has elapsed.

title: Added PreferenceUtils,used them in main + organized & fixed code

- Included preferences for the two spinners

title: Added currency codes to list adapter & images to spinner adapter
message:
Added currency codes to list adapter & images to spinner adapter

[Mod]: Added to CurrencyDataFilterListAdapter:
- Currency codes to output listview adapter.

title: Added colors, styled actionbar, tweaked & ref. main frag
message:
Added colors, styled actionbar, tweaked & ref. main frag

title: Added Currency object to CurrenyData & Currency calc can now format

Added Currency object to CurrenyData & Currency calc can now format

title: Adjusted layout,added strings for context & implemented main
message:
Adjusted layout,added strings for context & implemented main

[Mod][Add]: Added strings for the context menu copying of currencies
[Mod]: Added a listview to the layout, adjusted various values for
better use with smaller screens, adjusted workings of layout.
[Mod]: MainFragment - Major functionality added:
-Can switch source currency and update accordingly (symbols, flags, etc)
-Can switch destination currency and update according

-Can rotate and maintain values

title: Created basic filter list adapter for viewing currency output
message:
Created basic filter list adapter for viewing currency output

[Add]: fragment_currency_value specifies the basic outline of a
compatible layout with CurrencyDataFilterListAdapter.
[Add]: CurrencyDataFilterListAdapter provides a way to:
-Load all the support currencies
-Filter out select currencies
-Update the calculate values

title: [Add]: Created compat. util for copying text to the clipboard
message: [Add]: Created compat. util for copying text to the clipboard

title: Fixed AsyncModel's flag issue.Added spinner adapter & calc.utility
message:
Fixed AsyncModel's flag issue.Added spinner adapter & calc.utility

[Fix]: Fixed bug with Async Model where it was not fetching the flag
drawables in all instances.
[Mod]: CurrencyDataSpinnerAdapter provides a way to select either a
single currency or all currencies for spinners.
[Add]: CurrencyCalculator performs the calculations for conversions
using the USD rates as the base.

title: Add: Flag map,local model for currency exchange & async model start
message:
Add: Flag map,local model for currency exchange & async model start

[Add]: FlagResourceMap provides functionality to set flags to
appropriate currency dao.
[Add]: CurrencyExchangeRateModel is the local model that stores
fetched/generated values to the local database.
[Add]: CurrencyExchangeRateAsyncModel currently only intializes local
datatabase with default values. Will eventually fetch them from web.

title: Added license, strings, color file, basic layout start, & "flags"
message:
Added license, strings, color file, basic layout start, & "flags"

[Add]: Added colors.xml
[Add]: Added the 5 flag place holders of the 5 support country
currencies.
[Mod][Doc]: Added license and the cache warning formatted string.
[Mod]: Setup basic layout of fragment_main
[Mod]: Removed the context menu from activity_main

title: Added some safety & fixed exceptions in DatabaseOpenHelpers
message:
Added some safety & fixed exceptions in DatabaseOpenHelpers

[Mod]: DatabaseOpenHelper: introduced check for nulls in softClose()
[Ref][Fix]: DatabaseOpenHelper: Renamed getWritableDatabase() to
getWritableDatabaseOrThrow() as getReadableDatabase() apparently makes
indirect use of getWritableDatabase() and so would always throw. 
[Fix]: CurrencyConvertDatabaseOpenHelper: Removed problematic class
casting.

title: [Mod]: Implemented Parcelable interface & added mutator
message:
[Mod]: Implemented Parcelable interface & added mutator

-Added mutator for the flag drawable id.
-Implemented interface to make the data paracelable

title: Defined the interfaces for local models & class for async model
message:
Defined the interfaces for local models & class for async model

[Add]: ReadModel- A model for basic single read operations
[Add]: WriteModel- A model for basic single write operations
[Add]: ReadWriteModel - extends both the above, also allows a get all
records.
[Add]: AsyncModel- Used to define models that take an unknown amount of
time. This is based on the Handler object and so is Android dependent.

title: [Add]: Defined the basic structure of currency data access object
message: [Add]: Defined the basic structure of currency data access object

title: Defined the basic start of the database structure
message:
Defined the basic start of the database structure

[Add]: CurrencyConvertDatabaseOpenHelper defines a helper for this
application. Making use of CurrencyConvertDatabaseSchema.
[Add]: CurrencyConvertDatabaseSchema defines the schema for the
database.

title: [Add]: Added timestamp utility
message:
[Add]: Added timestamp utility

Simple timestamp utility that can:
-create UTC/GMT timestamps or local timestamps.
-parse timestamps into dates
-compare timestamps with each other or current time

title: Fixed timestamp & types for default rates,change v14 style to light
message:
Fixed timestamp & types for default rates,change v14 style to light

[Mod][Fix]: Changed the form of the timestamp to be compatible with
application. Changed floats to strings.
[Mod]: Changed v14 styles.xml to be actionbar light

title: Moved MainActivity to new sub-package & abstracted out fragment
message:
Moved MainActivity to new sub-package & abstracted out fragment

[Ref]: 
-MainActivity now resides in "ui"
-Created MainFragment from PlaceHolderFragment to inflate
fragment_main.xml
[Mod]: Updated mainfest to account for main activty's new location.

title: Added basic reusable classes for database handling
message:
Added basic reusable classes for database handling

[Add]: DatabaseOpenHelper:
-Safely creates readonly + read+write database helpers
-Prevents a "read-only" opener from opening a writable handle
-keeps single instance of writeHelper per schema.
[Add]: DatabaseSchema provides an abstraction for defining database
attributes. These include:
-Tables been creates
-Database name
-Database version

title: Added starting currency info & exchange rates
message:
Added starting currency info & exchange rates

[Add]: currency_codes_symbols contains basic information on each
currency such as:
-Symbol
-Code (e.g. CAD)
-Name
[Add]: default_exchange_rates defines the starting exchange rates to use
if the web is not accessible.

title: Initial commit.
message:
Initial commit.

[Add][Mod]: Set Mainfest to be installLocation="auto"
